website_summaries.verdict: Large for extra storage. Each drawer is large enough to hold a variety of items at the same time.
pros: Built-in sliders to hold paper folders
Internal locking mechanisms protect the drawers from damage while in use

customer_reviews.title: Good with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: I run a law practice and use this for my legs files. I keep it packed deep with legal size red wells. Some files are heavy with documents. After a short period of time, the drawer bottoms sagged and eventually popped out. Not ideal but understandable considering this is all particle wood. Under each drawer there is a recess of 1/2”. I cut out two pieces of plywood, one for each drawer, and mounted it with some Sheetrock screws. Problem solved. Now the drawers don’t bow under the weight. Aside from that issue, this is a well made cabinet that presents very well. It matches with any espresso or black finishes. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Delamater

customer_reviews.title: Great lateral file cabinet and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Found the Edge Water desk and had to have the matching lateral file cabinet. Ordered them together and put together this file cabinet first. I did read the directions twice before starting installation and labeled all pieces and put hardware in individual cups. Install took just under 2 hours and came out very nice. I did adjust the file cabinet drawer fronts and it looks absolutely perfect. This cabinet came with the file drawer hardware and is ready for your hanging file folders. This cabinet is of great quality and hats off the to the Sauder designers for the quality, packaging and finish of this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Malucci

customer_reviews.title: A bit cheap but wasnt expecting much
customer_reviews.text: Finish is cheaper than Ikea but for the price I wasn't expecting much....but maybe a little better. It's almost paper. It this was in a busier part of the house it wouldn't last a week! But as a file cabinet it is a nice size and from a distance looks nice. The drawers pop open when you push one closed so I have to double check that they are closed. Minor inconvenience. I was most concerned about price so I guess I shouldn't complain too much. It'll meet our needs for a while and will probably go in the basement eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA! Nice looking unit! Would be 5 star but for a build process design issue.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Easy build EXCEPT for one part which injured my foot. Faceplates on the drawers are screwed in from inside the drawers basically blindly and while partially my fault for not taking care, if you miss and its not secure it can fall down, which mine did on first attempt. Learned to do the handles FIRST to hold it in place THEN the 4 panel screws. Instructions didn't specify this, and IMO should. Good instruction set, but some mildly confusing parts. PAY ATTENTION to the FULL diagram. Read it first understand then build. Other than that this is a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... WAS LOOKING FOR A FILE CABINET THAT DOESNT LOOK LIKE A FILE CABINET
customer_reviews.text: I WAS LOOKING FOR A FILE CABINET THAT DOESNT LOOK LIKE A FILE CABINET. ONE OF THE HARDEST PIECE OF FURNITURE I EVER ASSEMBLED BUT I LOVE IT. SO REWARDING. THE SHELF BOTTOM ITSELF IS VERY THIN, SO I LINED THE EDGES OF EACH GROOVE WITH GORILLA WOOD GLUE BEFORE ASSEMBLING. EVENTUALLY I WILL REINFORCE THE SHELF WITH MDF OR PLYWOOD. PERFECT AND HELPED CLEAN UP ALL THE CLUTTERED PAPERWORK AROUND THE HOME.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael C.

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet ok, after fixing manufacturing mistake
customer_reviews.text: This would have gotten 4 stars because the color is nice and the cabinet looks good and functions overall, but it almost didn't function. Three of the major holes were drilled incorrectly. It was like the board became crooked when the holes were being drilled.The matching board on the other side was correct, so we know this board was really wrong. If it were just me, I wouldn't have been able to solve the problem and this would have been a useless pile of wood. My husband however was able to drill new holes and solve the issue, but that shouldn't have been necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ES1

customer_reviews.title: Take the week off if you plan to assemble this yourself.
customer_reviews.text: This sealed the deal for me. I will never, ever, EVER buy anything else that requires assembly. I have spent the past three afternoons and evenings trying to put this POS together. Every time I thought I was making progress, there was some other part to assemble or screw to drill. I'm absolutely exhausted and I'm actually pretty good at putting things together. Now that it's together, mine doesn't look very good. I'm sure I've put something on backwards or something. Of course, I'll have to go back tomorrow night and fix it. I. HATE. THIS. CABINET> Spend a little more money and find something that's assembled for you...you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This file cabinet is so awesome. It's very well built and sturdy. It's not cheap at all. It looks beautiful and functions perfectly. I like that only one drawer can be opened at a time so you don't unthinkingly open both and have it fall on you. The drawers are nice and big and fit lots of files. It's adjustable so it fits most file sizes. It took some time to assemble but wasn't too bad. I love how the drawers glide. They're so smooth. Neither drawer makes hardly any noise at all when opening and closing. This thing is so great and it looks like a dresser. I highly recommend this functional furniture piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really seem worth $200
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn't seem worth $200. It is particle board with a wood-looking finish. The drawers are a little weird but close ok. I definitely would not have bought it if I could have seen and tried it in person first. Oh, and there was a peeled off spot we noticed once it was all built. Too much of a hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: the b fam

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of years before writing this to see how the product would wear. Let me start by saying I put this together by myself. I'm a woman in my late 60s so it did take me a day and a half to do so but It would havegone very quickly with two people. However, it hasn't fallen apart, looks great and is perfectly functional for my purposes -- hanging folders mostly with a few office supplies.
customer_reviews.author: B. Savino

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart on me after 4 months of use. The sliders inside broke off the hard pressed wood. The flooring of each drawer is thin and flimsy and does not stay in the thin grove. Cannot put anything more than 2 packs of copy paper in it. Would not recommend this to anyone. Wonder if this will make the remarks section.
customer_reviews.author: jane bluhm

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together but nice once complete.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together and the instructions weren't great. Ended up using a video from the Sauder website to be able to successfully do it and it still took hours. We were in the middle of also putting together tons of Ikea furniture so the difference in directions and ease was very very clear. However, the finished product is solid and nice looking and does exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A few chips in the panels but still a great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for filing all of my fiancé’s business paperwork. It’s plenty big and looks perfect in our space. It’s also very sturdy and of good quality. It took him about 20 minutes to put it together. My only reason for giving 4 stars is because a few of the pieces came with nicks and chips. Luckily with this color though, it’s very easy to color in the spots with a black sharpie and no one can tell at all. But it would’ve been nice to have not had any damage to the pieces :) still a satisfied customer though.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture & Great instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Although it does take time to assemble, the instructions are SUPERB (and funny, with break times added in!). This is a great piece of office furniture, which helps me completely hide my office from my living room. A fantastic and homey illusion. If you take your time and build it right the drawers all open smoothly (if they don’t go in smoothly, there are instructions on how to make adjustments to fix it).
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Link

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It is super heavy when put together (empty). I moved it after putting it together and the top popped off. Went back and made sure I did everything correctly and it still pops off when moved. Have to pickup from the bottom to move it and it is very heavy. I like that it is heavy duty and how it organized the files and comes with the organizer inside but it seems like cheap material for the price.
customer_reviews.author: firewife

customer_reviews.title: Great style and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together than previous filing cabinets although took a little working out to get the safety mechanism properly which prevents both drawers opening at same time. It was really heavy, which is good as it has to hold heavy files. Look classic in the espresso dark color. Nice handles and smoothly opens and closes. Can be set to hold letter or legal sized file hangers by using the side holes as shown on photo. Overall, a really good looking filing cabinet for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet and Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cabinet. It is beautiful and very sturdy. The lateral filing drawers hold a lot and can be adjusted for different sized hanging folders and they glide incredibly smoothly. The only issue I had was assembling it, I did it by myself, and it took me a few hours, but the final product is more than worth it!
customer_reviews.author: K. K. West

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition to My Office
customer_reviews.text: This does take some time to assemble but its not difficult. It looks exactly like the pic...very nice piece. I transferred contents from a [full] two drawer file cabinet and I still have room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Candice B.

customer_reviews.title: Typical sauder furniture, pressed particle board. 3 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Typical sauder furniture, pressed particle board. 3 stars because the instructions were horrendous. I am very capable of building furniture but this just a mess. My 70 year old father tries to help and couldn't make sense of it. Also a few pieces were not labeled and had been scratched during S shipping. Find it local if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Pr

customer_reviews.title: Great File Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cabinet. It arrived in perfect condition and was easy to put together. It shuts easily and snug enough small children cannot open a draw. Would definitely buy again .
customer_reviews.author: T. C.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I completely agree with Rebecca, ordered in Aug. The exact same thing happened to me. The interior locking mechanism is made of cheap plastic & broke off inside, which locked my top file drawer. I had to get buy a crow-bar type tool to pry open the top to be able to get my files out. I had to disassemble it & ship it back (over 100 pounds) in order to get a refund. They then deducted $30 from what I paid. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bertacchi

customer_reviews.title: Great product/ bad odor.
customer_reviews.text: It does have a strong Oder that made me sneeze and my nose run. We assembled the entire thing in 2 hours. The entire house smelled like the wood for the remainder of the day. We moved the item to its permanent location and now that location smells like the wood. If you have an sensitivity to smell please beware.
customer_reviews.author: Talisha Zerfoss

customer_reviews.title: I used it well for about 1 and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it well for about 1 and a half year and suddenly this morning the bottom of the top drawer fell out of its groove, there is nothing heavy in it, not even filled all the way. I don't think it can be fixed without getting the drawer out, which is a hassle and disassembling it and reassembling it again and even then, i don't think it will be back to normal. I wouldn't trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Magued Rizk

customer_reviews.title: Tedious to put together...
customer_reviews.text: First shipment was an open box and not packaged properly - missing shipping straps and carboard corners. Product was chipped. It was a pain to arrange return. Replacement shipment was packed much better, was not an open box. I previously bought a Sauder desk and it took a while to put it together. This was no different. I will admit it is what I expected. The drawers do not line up horizontally and there is no adjustment. Other than that is works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, but hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I assembled, but it took us over 8 hours. I like the looks, but the front of the drawers is going to have to be adjusted This is a not for the faint of heart to assemble l, but once done, it is a true piece of furniture. I do worry about how long it will support so much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Rolin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful file cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This filing cabinet is beautiful and sturdy. It was fairly easy to assemble with one tricky part but I figured it out and managed to get it together fairly quickly by myself. Although it always helps to have a second person. The color is beautiful. It looks like a nice piece of furniture rather than your typical file cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, pretty, spacious but takes a while to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to set up. Took 2 hrs but it is beautiful and very Sturdy. Doesn't wobble or buckel. The seams of the cabinet are tight. Looks great in the house and holds lots of files. Comparable to having 2 short two drawer filling cabinets. FYI.. the pressboard is thick which makes it strong and very heavy. The box weighed 108 lbs. no key lock.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This would be a really nice piece but one of the side panels came with a very large scratch. Waiting to hear back from manufacturer to see how they will resolve. Very disappointing. Discovered during assembly, which was pretty complicated. Wishing I would have avoided the hassle and just gone to a furniture and bought something already assembled and damage free.
customer_reviews.author: Asprad

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my files!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, functional file cabinet. Matches the desk I had purchased from Sauder. Seems like good quality furniture. Went together in about 4 hours. Someone younger with better motor skills could have assembled it quicker I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people complain about putting these together. Just remind me of Ikea type furniture. Good quality for the price. We bought two of them for our home office and they are wonderful and look awesome! FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS and you'll be totally fine. I did do them over a two day period because I get frustrated easily, so I did a little on them at a time. The drawers were the most time consuming part. Remember that they are file cabinets, not dressers. They aren't made to have a lot of weight on the bottom of the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: WAZZU Cougar Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered other furniture and have assembled it ourselves several times. We are familiar with the types of cams and connections and screw assembly needed for this. After we finally got it together, it was a bit off. The directions were not great, but we were able to follow them. In the end the bottom drawer was not level. It was such a hassle to put together (and VERY heavy) so we won't take it apart and ship it back. Luckily it's not in a place where to many people will see it. My advice, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches my desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive file cabinet and it holds both letter and legal size files. I had the Edge Water desk and wanted something that looked good with it other than the metal file cabinets that are available. I received the cabinet on time and in good condition. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the time it takes to put it together. My husband and I spent about three hours putting it together and then had to make some adjustments for the drawers to fit properly. If you need a large file cabinet for your home office, this makes an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my home office and it looks exactly as pictured. I was very easy to put together, took roughly an hour and has held up well under regular use for the last 6 months. I have both drawers fully packed and haven't noticed any of the tracks bending or drawers popping open on their own. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: A. NicholsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Terrible assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: We had this put together by someone who does this for a living. He stated the instructions were the worst he had ever seen. Wish we hadn’t ordered this file cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok so first day bottom of file cabinet broke. Now a little over a month later the lower drawer bottom fell out and the back of the drawer broke so now I have to figure out how to fix it all or what I will do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cari A.

customer_reviews.title: Like the look
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall look of the cabinet. The drawers don’t line up properly so they scrub each other when opening and closing. Other than that, it’s a lovely piece.
customer_reviews.author: John Ziannis

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I was unable to open this and put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was unable to open this and put together until now (more than 30 days after purchase) and the item is defective.There is a scratch in the side panel and a chip on one of the drawer fronts but beyond that sevral of the holes needed to put this together are not there. Therefore the cabinet cannot be put together nor returned since it's been more than 30 days. Now I am out 190.00 bucks. What ever happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the most difficult time trying to pick out the perfect file cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I had the most difficult time trying to pick out the perfect file cabinet, but this one really did it. It is a very hefty piece of furniture, so it is not going anywhere. It is also a beautiful color and matches my room perfectly. The only thing I would say that is negative about this piece is, I cannot figure out how to make it fit standard size file folders rather than legal. Oh well, I bought legal file folders.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Sigmon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sauder Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem assembling the file cabinet. It was very easy to follow the step-by-step instructions. After assembling the file cabinet I inserted the cabinet drawers. I was about to fill the cabinet when I realized one of the drawers did not pull out. After much frustration, I called Sauder Customer Support and Linda walked us through resolving the problem! THANK YOU, Linda!
customer_reviews.author: Vernona M. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together looks good
customer_reviews.text: I found the instructions easy to follow and looks good. The only 2 issues I found were that one of the sections had the predrilled holes on the wrong end and I would also recommend using glue on the boards where they come together to strengthen them as the included hardware does not keep them together well. Once I hot glued them the cabinet was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Penney W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & classy piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: The price & quality of this file cabinet is unmatched! A spacious, functional, sturdy file cabinet that looks like a classy piece of furniture & less like a filing system. Sauder never lets down!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinets but they scratch REALLY EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with the drawers hitting each other. Left a message for Seller/Manufacturer... never heard back. Beautiful cabinets but they scratch REALLY EASILY. If not put together exactly, they will not work. UPDATE: Drawers lasted exactly, to the day, 6 months. Bottoms fell out. Not sure how to fix... Beware if you have files, and we do not have excessive files, you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Susann Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cabinet March of 2015 and yesterday August 17, 2016 the bottom of the drawers fell out. The files were hanging, nothing was sitting on the bottom of the drawer. A total waste of my money. They just don't make furniture like they use to.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great file cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great file cabinet, easy too assemble. Taking away 1 star because the back doesn't have chalked chestnut finish. I also have a chest and a desk from this set and they all have finish on their backs, just not the file cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: sfinks27

customer_reviews.title: OMG is this heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. Went together well. Best advice is to follow the instructions in the order they are printed. I have put together lots of Sauder pieces, and have always tried to follow directions in the order they were printed and have seldom had issues. I did come up a few screws short but had extras in my stash. Best advise is if you can't lift the box get help with this.
customer_reviews.author: c niezTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage!!! Do NOT waste your time or money buying any of Sauders products! Horrible customer service and very poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture.  Good quality.  Straightforward to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is exactly as described. The instructions were clear. The piece is solid. I use it for files (obviously) but just as much as a printer stand. The only part that wasn't exactly as described is the protection to prevent both drawers from being opened simultaneously. Perhaps I missed a step, but it really wasn't an issue. I didn't feel like disassembling it to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: RLD3

customer_reviews.title: Great filing cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy for both of us to work on. Not too difficult directions. All went together pretty smoothly. Part of an office redo and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece!  But read assembly instructions before you start!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to consolidate our important documents. It really helps to read the assembly instructions completely before you start. I took a pointer from another reviewer and used glue in the drawer bottoms. That firmed up the entire assembly. The cabinet is exactly what was promised and met all of our expectations. I'm thinking of buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The file cabinet is very nice looking. The price is right
customer_reviews.text: The file cabinet is very nice looking. The price is right. It was a bit of a pain to put together even for someone who knows how to put things together. Wood is VERY soft. Cabinet had a small scratch on the front. It wasn't worth shipping back. I just took a black permanent marker to it and it was all fixed up. Very roomy. Overall Love my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these filing drawers
customer_reviews.text: As easy to put together as ikea furniture is which i find fairly easy to put tgether. Easy to understand instructions with lots of pictures. Very sturdy and looks super nice like real furniture and not just a plain filing cabinet. Lots of room inside and i appreciate that i can change the size of the hanging files.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame, drawers don’t align
customer_reviews.text: This took around 1.5 hours to build as there are two drawers and the frame to fully assemble. The drawers do not align perfectly but I still like it. It’s a little bigger than expected but it came without any blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Cristina Harman

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Great filing cabinet in a contemporarily traditional style. Matched our red desk perfectly. Lost a star for being so time consuming to put together.
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: I'm not an amateur when it comes to assembling but this one was super annoying! The drawers don't even slide nicely once ...
customer_reviews.text: What a huge pain in the butt to put together. I'm not an amateur when it comes to assembling but this one was super annoying! The drawers don't even slide nicely once it was finished. It's ok but I just don't feel it worth the $200 price tag. Mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chia

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. Matches my kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Matches my kitchen cabinets. It took about 1:15hrs to put together, but I was watching hockey at the same time. I wasn't in a hurry. It's easy to assemble. It's heavy so put it where you want it before you put the drawers in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Deal

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. I spent over 5 hours putting this together. I followed the instructions step by step and in the end was left with a poorly constructed, wobbly product. I’m unable to use the drawers and literally can’t move it from the original location it was put together in fear that it will fall apart (again). Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOTS to assemble but a good piece for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sit down, take a deep breath and brew a pot of coffee before attempting to put together this file cabinet. There are LOTS of diagrams and instructions in the assembly manual, and a lot of pieces to coordinate with at times intricate instructions. Other than assembly time and effort, this piece holds up as a sturdy and good looking lateral file cabinet. A good buy for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kuczek

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an apartment where I needed both an end table and a file cabinet. This does both beautifully. This product is for hanging files only. Do not think you can use it to store heavy items or flat files.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece by Sauder
customer_reviews.text: Another beautiful piece by Sauder! It took a while to put together mostly because of the drawer mechanisms but it’s a spectacular piece and looks fabulous with the executive desk! Well worth the price and assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to assemble...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and works well, but be warned, it comes in 167 pieces (I counted) and even though I am pretty good a putting these things together, it took me over two hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: TBA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This took a little time to put together, but it wasn't hard. It looks so nice and the drawers open and close like an expensive piece of furniture. I highly recommend this file cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: scgirl

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this--It's in my dining room, but doesn't scream "FILE CABINET." So I keep my items CONVENIENTLY stored, while the room is still warm and homey.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst piece of self assembled furniture I’be ever received. I’ve bought cheap pressboard furniture in the pasts d have never experienced it falling apart as this piece did, before I could finish assembling. I would consider myself an expert in assembling Ikea furniture. This was the biggest pain and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this. It is well made and a beautiful piece of furniture that does not look like a file cabinet. It is in an office bedroom and works perfectly as another piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J. Little

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great in the space that I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks great in the space that I need to keep it in. It required a little more care in assembly then usual because of the safety feature preventing both drawers from being open at the same time, but I managed to get it together and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Esther H.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I like the file cabinet. It looks nice. The assembly was a bit much and the price was a bit high for having to assemble everything.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: The product is very good. It is heavy to move and thankful it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good. It is heavy to move and thankful it was delivered to my apartment doorstep because there was no way I would be able to carry it inside my apartment. I would not consider it "easy to assemble." If you are someone who assembles furniture often then it is probably easy to assemble. This was my first time and it took me about 5 hours to assemble by myself. It works great and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item. Looks great and sturdy. Paint holds up well. Drawers work great. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE WESTBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive as s piece of furniture and incredibly functional since it’s also a filing cabinet. It took my husband about 1 hour to put together (he’s very handy) and it all came together beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M

customer_reviews.title: This file cabinet can hold a lot of files and allows for great organization. This piece was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the Sauder Costa L-desk. This file cabinet can hold a lot of files and allows for great organization. This piece was easy to assemble, maybe about an hour or less. Looks fantastic in my home office and matches the L-desk perfectly. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chanman

customer_reviews.title: Functional and stylish
customer_reviews.text: For self assembly with common tools, this Unit actually exceeded expectations: Nice solid , quality product when fully assembled. Functional yet stylish looking. Step by step instructions easy to follow just take your time.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: For hanging files only!
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this cabinet for a year with no issues. Suddenly yesterday the bottom of the top drawer broke out. The thin 3/16" Masonite snapped like a pretzel under the weight of a single ream of paper, some manila envelopes, and a few lightweight misc. items. Apparently the drawers are only designed to bear weight on the hanging rods. It's a lovely cabinet, but don't plan on using it for anything but hanging files. Second photo is our repair using 1/8" Masonite 1/2 X 3/4 cleat stock.
customer_reviews.author: pbordensr

customer_reviews.title: After it was assembled it looks nice and was an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks but it was not easy to assemble. Need better photos of where things go. The drawer locks were difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expected better
customer_reviews.text: Drawers seem to roll back out when closing. My husband tried adjusting them which did help. There’s also more of a space between the drawer and frame on one side verses the other. For the price, I expected much nicer. But it does look nice with the matching desk. Also, lots of room for files and storage. It’ll do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Prast

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is so amazing. I searched quite a bit for something at this price point that looked like it would fit in as a piece of furniture and not just an ugly file cabinet. It is so sturdy and looks like a much more expensive piece of furniture than it is. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jmass

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong piece
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with is file cabinet. Heavy nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Joann H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, went together fairly easily - took about an hour and a half. It looks nice and seems pretty sturdy. Drawers work very smoothly. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Maybury

customer_reviews.title: Once you reinforce the bottoms with some good glue, you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms of the drawers HAVE to be reinforced as they don't hold much. I guess they were made only for filing, but my son had also a bunch of games he needed to put in. Once you reinforce the bottoms with some good glue, you'll love it! It is really spacious!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D.

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this filing cabinet. Very well made and looks like a nice piece of furniture. Exactly what I wanted. Took my husband a little bit to put together and he does that for a living but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Read all the directions before assembling.
customer_reviews.text: I found it challenging to assemble. Important details would be at the bottom of the page that had needed information for a step at the top. Near the end, one of the directions said to use force when pushing in the drawer. I did. It broke. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking file cabinet. It's all the way to the left in the attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Goel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged so i requested a replacement part. Then while putting the rest of it together while screwing a screw in it split a piece of particle board. Im really sorry i wasted my money on this. This piece of furniture will not last.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but a not the quality expected based on previous items.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with a broken top, which was quickly replaced by the manufacturer. The front legs are not completely even which prevents the top from setting flush with the frame. The drawer mechanism seems rough when the drawers are opened and closed. This item does not seem to be the same quality as previous Sauder items I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for business
customer_reviews.text: We had it less than a month and screws holding one of the shelves broke off. Not able to hold lots of heavy files.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This item looks really nice. However, it is not made of good quality. The item is not solid wood and did not last my move. The top and the legs completely came off the screws. It was all good up until I had it moved into the new house. I will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not easy. I wanted to buy another one but brother who assembled it said No Way.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Quality is horrible it won’t stay together or tighten up its a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: S t gil

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, horrible, horrible!!! Don't waste your time. It took my husband and I about 1.5 to put together and the drawers were not straight, they kept sticking and we couldn't get them to line up. It's just cheap! Then I had to take it all apart to ship it back for a refund. At least Amazon is great with returns!
customer_reviews.author: SMG from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of crap. Locking system failed and locked drawer shut. Had to break to open. Paint chips if you look at it cross eyed. Drawers took many attempts to make them look semi close to parallel and square. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: As the first reviewer. the thing fell apart during the assembling. LITEERALLY. My helper banged his hand just trying to push in the feet in. The top fell off and cannot be put together because the screws are unmatched. I do NOT RECCOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: e.l.

customer_reviews.title: It's doing what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with the matching desk. It says that it is black but it has some brown in it as well. Not enough to say the color is all wrong but if one is expecting a jet black color they won't get that with this item. Laying the pieces out and using he instructions is beneficial in putting it together. Took about 3 hours as a solo project. It does scratch easily and the top extends out further than I expected so that is why I took a star off. It's still nice.
customer_reviews.author: clutoledo

customer_reviews.title: Look, cost, durability
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. I love it! I just wish it locked and it would be perfect. Beautiful piece and came undamaged. Very heavy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SHbell

customer_reviews.title: These are very pretty file cabinets and work great
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty file cabinets and work great! However, they are also very cheap. I had mine for a week, and it was already chipped in multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: rachel warhover

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Wow this looks stunning in the office and very sturdy drawers are easy to open and close I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ambreezy

customer_reviews.title: Break out the wood glue!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this but you better break out the wood glue. This product is terrible when it comes to staying together! For the money spent on it I expect it to be sound and not fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Solid file cabinet and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this plus the matching desk. Both were relatively easy to assemble and are nice looking additions to my home office. They seem to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: After assembling the cabinet, the side panel cracked causing damage to the drawers. Cannot open drawers now.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It looks great! It’s sturdy and putting it together was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match to other furniture
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to other furniture. Much better price than local Office Depot and others. Better be prepared for about a 2 hour assembly and have the right tools. Don't force anything or try to make it work. If it doesn't fit - you're putting it together wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great looking file cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking file cabinet, but be ready to spend some time putting it together. Level was difficult, even for a pro
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLuckyGirl

product_meta.title: Sauder Edge Water Lateral File, Estate Black finish
product_meta.description: Color:Estate Black FinishLooking for a solution for your unorganized mess of papers? Check out this lateral file from the Edge Water collection. It features two drawers with full extension slides to hold letter or legal size hanging files. It also includes a patented, interlocking safety mechanism that allows only one drawer to open at a time. Finished in a classy Estate Black, this lateral file gets the job done and looks good doing it.
feature_bullets: Drawers with full extension slides hold letter or legal size hanging files
Patented, interlocking safety mechanism allows only one drawer open at a time
Assembled dimensions: L: 33.307" x W: 23.465" x H: 29.37

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars609 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
